sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
has just happened
, se je zgodilo pred zelo malo časa.

seg.quote: I've just sold my car.
She had only just moved in.

sense.def:
I am just doing something
rečemo, ko mislimo, da bomo nekaj zelo kmalu dokončali.
I am just going to do something
rečemo, ko nameravamo nekaj zelo kmalu storiti.

seg.quote: I'm just making us some coffee.
They were just about to leave.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
just
lahko tudi poudarimo, da se nekaj dogaja ali se je zgodilo natančno v trenutku, o katerem govorimo.

seg.quote: The telephone rang just as I was about to serve up the dinner.
Judy didn't like to tell him just then.

sense.def:
Just now
pomeni zdaj ali pred zelo malo časa.

seg.quote: Nasty weather we're having just now.
She was here just now.

sense.def:
Just a minute
,
just a moment
ali
just a second
rečemo, kadar nekoga prosimo, naj malo počaka.

seg.quote: ‘Have you got John's address?’—‘Just a minute. I'll have a look.’

sense.def:
Z izrazom
just
tudi povemo, da nekaj ni zelo pomembno, zanimivo, težavno ali sijajno.

seg.quote: It's just a story.
It is not just a children's film.
Just add boiling water.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
just
tudi povemo, da govorimo o majhnem delu ali vzorcu nečesa, ne o celotni količini.

seg.quote: These are just a few of the enquiries.

sense.def:
Izraz
just
tudi pove, da je tisto, kar govorimo, res, a samo v zelo majhnem obsegu.

seg.quote: The heat was just bearable.
He could only just hear them.
It might just help.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
just
poudarimo tisto, kar govorimo.

seg.quote: I just know there's something wrong.
Just listen to that noise.

sense.def:
Just
pomeni tudi natančno ali točno.

seg.quote: That's just what I wanted to hear.
She was as fat as he was and just as unattractive.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je nekdo
just the person
, hočemo povedati, da je prava oseba. Kadar je nekaj
just the thing
, je prava stvar.

seg.quote: Sam would be just the person!
He knew just the place.

sense.def:
Just
uporabljamo tudi v vljudnih prošnjah in prekinitvah.

seg.quote: Can I just use your lighter please?

sense.def:
Z izrazom
just about
povemo, da je nekaj tako blizu določeni ravni ali stanju, da lahko velja, kot da ga je dosegel.

seg.quote: She was just about his age.
Everything is just about ready.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
just
, je razumen ali pravičen.

seg.quote: ...a just punishment.
...a just and civilised society.
I believe that I have acted justly.
